summary: Your one stop source for lore friendly and quality re-textures of Mage Equipment like staves, some daedric artifacts and much more. The mod will be expanded whenever I finish a new item.
descriptionHtml:
[font=century gothic][color=Green][u][b][size=+3]EcthelionOtW Mage Equipment Overhaul[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a6JkZvtl.jpg[/IMG]

[font=century gothic][color=red][u][b][size=+2]Update[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]The first two packs of the much anticipated mage robes can be found here :

[URL=http://imgur.com/l1iydJg][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/l1iydJgs.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/49110]EotW Mage Equipment Overhaul - College Robes[/url]

[URL=http://imgur.com/RPYb5nB][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RPYb5nBs.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/49569]EotW Mage Equipment Overhaul - Long Robes[/url]


[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]About this Mod[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]This mod offers a lore friendly quality texture makeover for mage related vanilla gear which includes staves, Daedric artifacts like Spellbreaker or Azura's Star. Future updates will include other things like Dragon Priest masks, mage robes etc. so I do highly recommend to track this mod for updates if you like my work.

This mod is highly modular, as you can either choose the full pack which will be updated with every new addition or - if you only want to use parts of this mod - the single items like "Spellbreaker" or themed packs like "staves".

Many of the items have hardly been covered by mods so far or there are too little options to choose from, so I decided to do this myself since many of these things are really cool to use and therefore shall not be neglected anymore.

The textures of the main version are quite big, but can be used without problems as all of my various testers have reported. I chose to keep them uncompressed for the best possible texture quality and look. A performance version will be added soon if required, but I really recommend to use the main uncompressed version.

About the looks of it images can say more than thousand words of mine - especially since I had the honour to be able to get some of the greatest screenarchers on the Nexus as beta testers for my work. Be sure to check out their remarkable work in the gallery on this front page and in the image section of this mod. I can also recommend to watch the fantastic review videos which show my stuff how it actuelly looks and works ingame.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Completion Status[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]
Spellbreaker - Done
Staff Pack 01 - Done
Azura's Star and Black Star - Done
Dragon Priest Masks - WIP
Staff Pack 02 - Done
Daedric Staves - Done
Staff Pack 03 - not yet started
DLC Staves - not yet started
Mage Clothing - WIP
[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Video Reviews[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]

[youtube]fCDH4s0a_NU[/youtube]
by hodilton

[youtube]1k8HHkmgzZU[/youtube]
by Saiodin


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Requirements[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]Skyrim 1.8+ is required for this mod to work. Future updates may include items from the DLC's but if that is the case these files will be marked and described as such.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Installation[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]Download the mod file and extract the file into your skyrim directory, e.g. C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData and say "yes" when being asked to integrate and override.

[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Un-installation[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]Delete the file via NMM or manually by deleting the files contained in the mod folder within your Skyrim "Textures" folder.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Compatibility[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]This mod is compatible with everything except mods that alter the same TEXTURES. Scripts or ESP-files are not included so there should be absolutely zero bugs or game relevant compatibility issues.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]The Items[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DDBv88Sl.jpg[/IMG]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]The Spellbreaker is the noble artifact of the Daedric Prince Peyrite and can be obtained during his questline. It is a powerful shield which has a unique magical effect and is especially effective against all kinds of magic.[/size][/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XTvpRNvl.jpg[/IMG]
by Yyna

[size=+1][color=lightblue]The Staff of Magnus is a unique and very powerful staff that can be obtained during the College of Winterhold Questline.[/size][/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MV84jbEl.jpg[/IMG]
by misslexi

[size=+1][color=lightblue]A Staff of Restoration that can be found everywhere in the game.[/size][/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QYixUpCl.jpg[/IMG]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]A Staff of Destruction that can be found everywhere in the game.[/size][/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7cPv8mSl.jpg[/IMG]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]Azura's Star - a beautiful Daedric artifact that can be obtained during her questline. Now it is made of her proper element - refined moonstone - and will no longer look dull and worthless.[/size][/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cN54H9il.jpg[/IMG]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]The Black Star - Azura's Star corrupted.[/size][/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Jr0Wp6ul.jpg[/IMG]
by misslexi

[size=+1][color=lightblue]The Wabbajack can be obtained during the Daedric Quest of Sheogorath - the prince of madness.[/size][/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oDoezdHl.jpg[/IMG]
by misslexi

[size=+1][color=lightblue]The Skull of Corruption belongs to the Daedric prince Vaermina and wields a unique evil power.[/size][/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/42W7U2cl.jpg[/IMG]
by Yyna

[size=+1][color=lightblue]Sanguine's Rose is the mighty staff of the Daedric prince Sanguine and can be found during his fantastic questline.[/size][/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AcArO8ol.jpg[/IMG]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]A Staff of Conjuration that can be found everywhere in the game.[/size][/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ukLwPNcl.jpg[/IMG]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]A Staff of Illusion that can be found everywhere in the game.[/size][/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/X6jwALLl.jpg[/IMG]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]A unique Dragon Priest Staff that can be found during the Main Quest.[/size][/color]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]More items will follow soon.[/size][/color]

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Credits[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]Credits go to...

- Yuril for some base gem textures -> check out his great [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6495]Better Circlets mod[/url]
- misslexi for the gorgeous cover shot
- Bethesda for creating the gaming masterpiece Skyrim, Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLC and the HD texture packs
- Professor Tolkien who made a fact-loving lawyer and historician believe in magic again, the day I discovered his unique and ever outstanding work back in 2001
- Peter Jackson and WETA Workshop for being a great inspiration for this mod
- Lana del Rey, Howard Shore, Harry Gregson-Williams, Richard Wagner, Giacomo Puccini and others for helping me through endless hours of modding work

and last but absolutely not least to my fantastic group of friends and beta testers :[/size][/color]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]The gallery on this front page is a tribute to YOU and your contribution, your friendly help and encouragement and as well to your inspiring and outstanding screenarchery work. I would not be modding anymore without you! THANK YOU SO MUCH![/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Permissions[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]You are not allowed to use any assets of this mod whithout my permission.[/size][/color]

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Gallery[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]Now, after so much reading you really deserve the visual joyride provided by my wonderful Beta testers. Be sure to check out their other work here on the Nexus ( links to their work can be found in the "Credits" section. Enjoy it![/size][/color]

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Author's note[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]If you like this mod please take a second to show your apprechiation and endorse it, leave a comment or load up a picture - I'd be really grateful for it, since I have put many hours of work and a lot of determination into it. If you enjoy a mod a few clicks should not be too much to ask for. If you face any issues please let me know, so that we may find a solution.[/size][/color]
